name: Peppermint Shake
description: Peppermint Milkshakes - simple, quick and delicious! They're one of our favorite holiday treats! A cool drink made from vanilla ice cream, milk, peppermint extract and topped with whipped cream and crushed candy cane pieces!
directions: Add ice cream, milk, crushed cane pieces and peppermint extract to a blender.
Pour into glass and top with whipped cream and candy cane pieces.
